description:
At the end of this course the you will learn,

  • About Microsoft SharePoint 2010 Installation and configuration
  • Hardware and software requirements for Microsoft SharePoint 2010
  • About web application management and IIS manager in Microsoft SharePoint 2010
  • The well planned process that helps in re-evaluating the overall performance of SharePoint (SharePoint migration)
  • Search administration reports, which provides crawl and query data
  • Managed metadata is a hieratical collection of centralizes managed term used by user to characterize and label content on SharePoint sites
  • The SharePoint server creates three databases for storing user profile information and associated data
title: Microsoft SharePoint 2010 Administrator Advance
